issue.title: [Dev] Use miniforge for all platforms
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12490](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12490). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In release verification script, miniforge is used for MacOS (amd64, arm64) and Linux+arm64, but Linux+amd64 uses miniconda. It's better to use miniforge only for all platforms.
See https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/10109#discussion_r616742620
